
                            
                            <p>第一次买的是梦越店铺拖把池，四面都凹凸不平，其中两面一边粗一边细，退货了，又在天猫尚榕卫浴买了，刚拆开一看沙眼了，第一眼明显拖把池走位了，向内凹进去，两边相差2厘米，像一个斜的垂直线，商家立马打电话说补偿20元，或者退货他们联系人上门取件。每个拖把池都是300多元买的，这次我算是彻底对拖把池失望了，本地实体店没有合适的款式也不行。 <br>  <br> 大家推荐个商家。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103036wk84j9960q4qu51k.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103036wk84j9960q4qu51k.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103043xclgdcqfrbbmrsc1.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103043xclgdcqfrbbmrsc1.png"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103048d506qd7g073tgqun.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103048d506qd7g073tgqun.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103052ikcchgokl66enozc.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103052ikcchgokl66enozc.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103104ydh8crzk39lyt3mm.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103104ydh8crzk39lyt3mm.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103110lnnpvn6nm8m2ife5.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/103110lnnpvn6nm8m2ife5.jpeg"> </p>
